result.arabic_text: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَلۡتَنظُرۡ نَفۡسٞ مَّا قَدَّمَتۡ لِغَدٖۖ وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ خَبِيرُۢ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ
result.translation: 18. Yallaa kee kay farmoyta nummayse maraw! yallak meesita, usuk sin kah amrisem abtaanaah usuk sin как waaseemik waasimtaanamal, kaadu kulli nafsi beerah (Qhiyaamah ayro kinnuk) taamak tatrusem wagitay, Kaadu Yallak meesita, diggah Yalli isin abba haytaanamak adda yaaxigi kinnik.
